item.title: Npcdialogue choice not working?
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

if(c.NpcDialogue == 9){ c.closeAll(); }
after the c.closeall(); add the other part of the code.

EDIT: paste the choice code, plus look if you’re server doesn’t have any other codes for dialog 9.

Read full topic

item.title: Npcdialogue choice not working?
item.dc:creator: @lungxapples lungxapples
item.description:
@lungxapples wrote:

Well i have a choice for ex. “yes” “no” for a quest and when you click one on the npc dialogue nothing happends…? I coded it in case 9157: and case 9158: heres the codes

case 9157:

if(NpcDialogue == 5){ closeAll(); NpcDialogue = 6; NpcDialogueSend = false; } if(NpcDialogue == 9){ closeAll(); NpcDialogue = 10; NpcDialogueSend = false; }

case 9158:

if(NpcDialogue == 5){ closeAll(); } if(NpcDialogue == 5 || NpcDialogue == 9){ closeAll(); } break;

The code for the dialogue:

case 4: talk("Oh dear, oh dear.. The king is going to kill me!", 605); break; case 5: choice("Why? What's the matter?", "Tough luck buddy."); break; case 6: talk2("I spilled some cheese on the castle court,","now there are rats everywhere!", 605); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 8: talk2("Say, you look quite bold.", "Could you take care of the rats for me?", 605); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 9: choice("Yeah sure, but what's in it for me?","RATS?!? HELL NO MAN!"); break; case 10: talk2("Come back to me when you have killed 5 rats,","I promise I will reward you greatly!", 605); quest1 = 1; NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 11: talk2("You killed 5 rats? Great!","Please, take this as a sign of gratitude.",605); quest1 = 3; NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

Read full topic
